pkgmetadata.longdescription: Performance Metrics in Predictive Modeling // Performance metric provides different performance measures like mean squared error, root mean square error, mean absolute deviation, mean absolute percentage error etc. of a fitted model. These can provide a way for forecasters to quantitatively compare the performance of competing models. For method details see (i) Pankaj Das (2020) http://krishi.icar.gov.in/jspui/handle/123456789/44138.
